sql:
SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT
anonymousId as anonymous_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
CAST(timestamp AS DATE) as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp
FROM events
WHERE event = 'Add to Cart'

userId as user_id,

qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT

FROM orders

timestamp as timestamp
